class.name: HiLo
class.documentation: Maxima/minima may be plotted as text and/or as numerical values, default being symbols (H and L ). The user may, by calling the parameter setting routines, plot maxima/minima values in various colours, heights, qualities etc. Users have facilities for plotting only one of these values, i.e. local maxima or local minima.

parameter.name: contour_hilo_type
parameter.documentation: Type of high/low (TEXT/NUMBER/BOTH)
parameter.migration: New Magics: Parameter contour_hilo_type sent to new Magics[HiLo].

parameter.name: contour_hilo_window_size
parameter.documentation: Size of the window used to calculate the Hi/Lo
parameter.migration: New Magics: Parameter contour_hilo_window_size sent to new Magics[HiLo].
parameter.release_info: new Parameter : we envisage to have different methods to calculate Hi/Lo in future releases

parameter.name: contour_hilo_reduction_radius
parameter.documentation: Search radius (in grid points) for reducing the number of minima
parameter.migration: New Magics: Parameter contour_hilo_reduction_radius sent to new Magics[HiLo].
parameter.release_info: Parameter defined but not implemented : expected in 0.7

parameter.name: contour_hilo_suppress_radius
parameter.documentation: Radius of HiLo search in grid points (default value is for global cylindrical map)
parameter.migration: New Magics: Parameter contour_hilo_suppress_radius sent to new Magics[HiLo].
parameter.release_info: Parameter defined but not implemented: expected in 0.7

parameter.name: contour_hilo_max_value
parameter.documentation: Local HiLo above specified value are not drawn
parameter.migration: New Magics: Parameter contour_hilo_max_value sent to new Magics[HiLo].

parameter.name: contour_hilo_min_value
parameter.documentation: Local HiLo below specified value are not drawn
parameter.migration: New Magics: Parameter contour_hilo_min_value sent to new Magics[HiLo].

parameter.name: contour_hi_max_value
parameter.documentation: Local HI above specified value are not drawn
parameter.migration: New Magics: Parameter contour_hi_max_value sent to new Magics[HiLo].

parameter.name: contour_hi_min_value
parameter.documentation: Local HI below specified value are not drawn
parameter.migration: New Magics: Parameter contour_hi_min_value sent to new Magics[HiLo].

parameter.name: contour_lo_max_value
parameter.documentation: Local Lo above specified value are not drawn

parameter.name: contour_lo_min_value
parameter.documentation: Local Lo below specified value are not drawn

parameter.name: contour_hilo_marker
parameter.documentation: Plot hilo marker (ON/OFF)

class.name: HiLoMarker
class.documentation: The position of a maxima/minima value may be marked by plotting a symbol on the precise location. Users may define their own symbol by setting the parameter CONTOUR_HiLo_MARKER_INDEX

parameter.name: contour_hilo_marker_height
parameter.documentation: Height of HiLo marker symbol

parameter.name: contour_hilo_marker_index
parameter.documentation: Table number of marker symbol. See chapter on Plotting Attributes

parameter.name: contour_hilo_marker_colour
parameter.documentation: Colour of grid point markers(Full choice of colours)

class.name: NoHiLoMarker
class.documentation: This object suppresses the plotting of Hi/Lo markers

class.name: HiLoSave
class.documentation: The User can dowload the positions of the High and Lows in a file. The information will be stored using the Metview GeoPoint file format.

parameter.name: contour_hilo_position_file_name
parameter.documentation: Path/filename of HiLo file to write

class.name: NoHiLoSave
class.documentation: This object suppresses the saving of Hi/Lo information.

class.name: HiLoNumber
class.documentation: This object is reponsible for plotting the HI/Lo as text.

parameter.name: contour_hilo_format
parameter.documentation: Format of HiLo numbers (MAGICS Format/(AUTOMATIC))

parameter.name: contour_hilo_blanking
parameter.documentation: Blank around highs and lows (ON/OFF)

class.name: HiLoTechnique
class.documentation: common attributes to the HiLo technique plotting

parameter.name: contour_hilo_height
parameter.documentation: Height of local maxima/minima text or numbers

parameter.name: contour_hilo_quality
parameter.documentation: (LOW/MEDIUM/HIGH)

parameter.name: contour_hi_colour
parameter.documentation: Colour of local maxima text or number

parameter.name: contour_lo_colour
parameter.documentation: Colour of local minima text or number
